title: Burn for Her
description: A two-ton dragon doesn’t stop on a dime. But his heart ignites in an instant.NentresI need a woman who lights my fire. Specifically, the spirit who’ll ignite my dragon’s fire element. The problem? Amy, a pretty peach with big green eyes, couldn’t be any less interested in me. Maybe that’s why she’s a challenging morsel I plan to savor until I select my spirit. It sounds like a foolproof plan — until my dragon catches her scent and growls, “Mine.”She may not be interested now, but I'm gonna make her mine. Or die trying. AmyAfter my body rejects Cy implants, I count myself lucky my witch of a stepmother doesn’t simply kill me with her well-oiled claws. But marry a richer-than-God outlaw? Forget it. No way I’m letting myself get attached to anyone — especially a man.I’ll plan his lordship’s party — excuse me, his ball. When he’s picked his bride, I’ll be free. Except the longer I’m under his roof — and in his arms — the harder it is to remember why I’m so desperate to leave…
author: Milana Jacks
